post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 Human Services I&IT Cluster

주소 Canada Ontario  
  49 Place d'Armes, 5th Fl., Kingston, ON K7L 5J3

홈페이지  

회사소개 Canada Ontario Government Department


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 SENIOR DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR

고용형태  

모집기간  Apply by Jan 24, 2003

급여 $1,293 - $1,521 / week

근무지 Canada   Ontario 5700 Yonge St., Toronto  


지원자격
학력  

자격증  

경력  

필요한기술 Bring your technical expertise to the Human Services I&IT Cluster's technology management branch to provide strategic direction for new projects, systems recovery, contingency and day-to-day activities as the authoritative source for ORACLE database-management systems in large complex 24X7 mainframe/multi-tier application environment. You will: provide architectural advice/guidance to client groups; support senior application developers; lead corporate database design, development projects; recommend data-management strategy, disaster recovery plans to clients by assessing user needs/requirements.

Qualifications: extensive knowledge of data management, information architecture theory/principles/techniques, data modelling techniques; extensive knowledge of database-development methodologies, Middleware technologies, programming languages, data dictionaries, storage/retrieval, testing, implementation methods/practices; extensive experience in administration of large databases (ORACLE); strong analysis, planning, problem-solving, evaluative skills; excellent communication, interpersonal skills.


기타  


지원방법
지원방법 By Email  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 613- 548- 6693  

이메일 Resumes_HSC_KI@moh.gov.on.ca
post.title: SENIOR DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR
